title: SC EP:69 Bigfoot chased ATV
itunes:title: SC EP:69 Bigfoot chased ATV
description:
We will be speaking to a listener who describes being chased on his ATV by a Sasquatch, and having a boulder size rock thrown at his head. We also have a surprise story for everyone.

In the second half of the show we will be interviewing a police officer who has responded to several 911 calls related to Sasquatch.
